statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_address;
SELECT id, address, owner_id FROM wallet_address;
SELECT * FROM wallet_address WHERE owner_id = 'xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx';
SELECT * FROM wallet_address ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM wallet_address WHERE id = 'yyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyy';
SELECT * FROM wallet_address WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, address FROM wallet_address WHERE address LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM wallet_address WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wallet_address ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) FROM wallet_address GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM wallet_address;
SELECT id, address FROM wallet_address WHERE owner_id = '12345';
SELECT id, address FROM wallet_address ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) AS num_addresses FROM wallet_address GROUP BY owner_id;
SELECT w.id, w.name, wa.address FROM wallet_owner w INNER JOIN wallet_address wa ON w.id = wa.owner_id;
SELECT id, owner_id, address FROM wallet_address WHERE owner_id = '5f7d02ed-ebcc-42a0-826b-1e06b02b08bd';
SELECT * FROM wallet_owner WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, name FROM wallet_owner ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, address, owner_id FROM wallet_address WHERE id IN ('132bdbea-315e-4b36-a4e2-61ef592f02a9', '76a813c2-58d5-4a6e-a2c8-294ded7b4f63');
SELECT w.id AS wallet_id, o.name AS owner_name, o.email AS owner_email FROM wallet_address w JOIN wallet_owner o ON w.owner_id = o.id;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT id, address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wallet_owners ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM wallet_owners WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT address_id, owner_id FROM address_ownership ORDER BY owner_id ASC, address_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT id, address, owner_id FROM wallet_addresses WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT w.name AS owner_name, wa.address AS wallet_address FROM wallet_owners w JOIN wallet_addresses wa ON w.id = wa.owner_id WHERE w.email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT wa.address, wo.name AS owner_name FROM wallet_addresses wa LEFT JOIN wallet_owners wo ON wa.owner_id = wo.id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT wa.owner_id) AS unique_owners FROM wallet_addresses wa JOIN address_ownership ao ON wa.id = ao.address_id WHERE ao.owner_id != 1
SELECT * FROM wallet_address;
SELECT address_id, owner_name FROM wallet_address ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name FROM wallet_address;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM wallet_address WHERE owner_name='Alice';
SELECT * FROM wallet_transaction WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wallet_address;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM wallet_address WHERE address_id = 3;
SELECT owner_name, transaction_date, amount FROM wallet_address JOIN wallet_transaction ON wallet_address.owner_name = wallet_transaction.sender_id;
SELECT owner_name, transaction_date, amount FROM wallet_transaction JOIN owner ON wallet_transaction.sender_id = owner.owner_id;
SELECT owner_name, amount, transaction_type FROM wallet_transaction JOIN owner ON owner.owner_id = wallet_transaction.sender_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT wallet_id, owner_name, address, created_at FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM wallet_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM wallet_addresses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY wallet_id HAVING balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT wl.owner_name, wlog.log_message FROM wallet_addresses wl JOIN wallet_logs wlog ON wl.wallet_id = wlog.transaction_id;
